articles.title: BYD's Yangwang U9 supercar can autonomously leap over low obstacles at high speed
articles.author: Brett Venter
articles.summary: BYD is launching its new supercar, the Yangwang U9. The U9 is designed with special abilities such as autonomously hopping over obstacles at speeds of about 120km/h.

articles.title: Innovative Idaho-based food product competition worth up to $300K
articles.author: Marc Lutz
articles.summary: Albertsons Companies has launched its third annual Innovation Launchpad competition, targeting emerging food, beverage, and pet product brands with retail sales between $3 million and $10 million. The top three winners will receive prizes valued at over $300,000 and potential distribution in Albertsons banner stores. Applications are open until January 19, 2025.

articles.title: I danced with a robot.. here's how I'm convinced the future is here
articles.author: Luke Andrews
articles.summary: Engine.AI is developing humanoid robots like the SA01, SE01 and PM01 for various tasks ranging from security to household chores; the SA01 costs $5,300, while SE01 and PM01 cost $13,700. Other companies such as Unitree, Tesla, and 1X are also developing their own humanoid robots, with 1X sending its Neo robot to homes for testing. These advancements suggest a growing trend toward the widespread adoption of robots in various sectors.

articles.title: [2025 Update] FlexiMop Reviews: Unveiling the Truth Behind Its Popularity
articles.author: Herald Net
articles.summary: FlexiMop is a versatile cleaning tool designed to revolutionize the cleaning routine by tackling stubborn stains.

articles.title: NVIDIA Announces Blueprint for AI Retail Shopping Assistants  Jan. 10, 2025 22:00
articles.summary: NVIDIA has introduced the NVIDIA AI Blueprint for retail shopping assistants. SoftServe has developed SoftServe Gen AI Shopping Assistant using NVIDIA's blueprint, which helps customers by virtual try-on capabilities to visualize how products look on them directly through an online chat before making a purchase.

articles.title: Samsung is offering a $50 credit and up to $1,250 in total savings when you reserve the new Galaxy S25 phones
articles.author: Antonio Villas-Boas
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch its Galaxy S25 series at an "Unpacked" event on January 22nd. A reservation offer is available ahead of the event, potentially providing up to $1,250 in credits through a combination of preorder credits, additional product credits, and trade-in values for old phones.

articles.title: The new Model Y has a Cybertruck-like light bar. The noticeable change could help convince ...
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Tesla launched a redesigned Model Y in China. The new Model Y features a revamped Cybertruck-like look. This launch is considered a significant change for Tesla, potentially addressing slumping vehicle deliveries.

articles.title: Ninja's £59 kettle in the sale hailed a 'game changer' for tea and coffee drinkers
articles.author: Emily Chaplin
articles.summary: Ninja has reduced the price of its kettle, featuring a rapid boil function and a temperature hold setting. The kettle has received positive reviews for its temperature control and design, with users praising the 30-minute keep-warm function and overall performance.

articles.title: Amazon to shut down 'Try Before You Buy' rival to Stitch Fix
articles.author: Annie Palmer
articles.summary: Amazon is discontinuing its "Prime Try Before You Buy" service, which allowed Prime members to try clothes, shoes, and accessories before purchasing. The service will be discontinued on January 31, and users are directed to Amazon's fashion homepage.

articles.title: ESScent Of The Week: This Unexpected Jo Malone Scent Became My Signature — And Here's Why
articles.author: Kimberly Wilson
articles.summary: Jo Malone London has a Mimosa & Cardamom fragrance, which features fresh cardamom, mimosa, tonka bean, and sandalwood notes. The fragrance evolves throughout the day, offering a versatile scent experience that can be paired with other fragrances for unique combinations. The brand creates contemporary classics that resonate with a new generation of fragrance enthusiasts.

articles.title: Here's every station wagon you can still buy in America in 2025
articles.author: Cole Attisha
articles.summary: Several companies are launching or offering new station wagon models for the 2025 model year. Audi presents models like A4 Allroad Quattro, A6 Allroad Quattro and RS6 Avant Performance, while BMW introduces the 2025 M5 Touring. Other offerings include Kia's EV6, Mercedes-Benz's E-Class All-Terrain, Porsche's Taycan GTS Sport Turismo and Cross Turismo, Toyota's Crown Signia, Subaru's Outback, and Volvo's V60 and V90 Cross Country.

articles.title: The new Model Y has a Cybertruck-like light bar. The noticeable change could help convince car buyers to upgrade.
articles.summary: Tesla is releasing a refreshed Model Y in China, which is designed to stand out and potentially boost sales or encourage upgrades from existing Model Y owners. While not yet available in the US, investors anticipate its arrival in 2025.

articles.title: A super bright TV, a monitor that replaces headphones and a cleaner with a cat litter box. Overview of the most interesting innovations from CES
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Dell launched the Dell 32 Plus 4K gaming monitor with spatial sound technology. Acer introduced the Nitro Blaze 11 handheld gaming device, and Pimax showcased the Crystal Super VR glasses. Furthermore, the PREMIUM+ package offers exclusive articles and ad-free videos across nine different sites.

articles.title: CORRECTION -- Royal Caviar Club Partners with Rezolve Ai to Elevate Digital Channels with ...
articles.author: Rezolve AI Ltd
articles.summary: Royal Caviar Club (RCC) has partnered with Rezolve Ai to leverage Rezolve Ai's BRAiN Commerce suite to create a seamless digital experience. RCC's adoption of Rezolve Ai's conversational commerce tools allows it to offer personalized interactions, streamlined checkouts, and AI-driven product recommendations. This partnership positions RCC at the forefront of luxury eCommerce innovation.

articles.title: Beauty Buzz: Merit Flush Balm Cream Blush, Benefit Cosmetics Mighty Fine Brow Pen and Skinfix Eczema+ Hand Relief Cream
articles.author: Aleesha Harris
articles.summary: Merit introduced five new shades to their bestselling cream blush collection. Benefit Cosmetics launched Mighty Fine Brow Pen, featuring a trio-tipped brush for creating natural, hairlike strokes. Skinfix released Eczema+ Hand Relief Cream, formulated with ceramides and colloidal oatmeal to hydrate and protect dry, cracked skin.

articles.title: Sky TV just got a lot cheaper but something 'better' is coming soon
articles.author: Joshua Boyles
articles.summary: Sky is teasing a potential new product launch, possibly a new Sky Q box, a refreshed Sky Stream device, or a new television, with more details expected at an event in February.

articles.title: Smart Robots to Urban Skiing: 28 Gadgets Redefining Cool in 2025
articles.author: Shaun Key
articles.summary: Samsung introduces Ballie, a rolling robot for smart home management. LitterRobot 4 automates pet care. Typhur launches InstaProbe for fast temperature readings during cooking. Format S brings industrial vacuum forming to desktops, while NAW adds color mixing to 3D printing.

articles.title: Wife snoops around husband's phone and ends up getting him the a holiday gift he will never forget
articles.summary: A Reddit user received a customized pair of Nike 'Internationalist' edition sneakers as a gift from his wife. He had previously designed the sneakers using the Nike app but didn't purchase them due to the price. The customized sneakers feature specific colors and the 'Just Do It' tagline.

articles.title: Council Post: Dev Teams: How To Prioritize And Foster Human-Centered Design
articles.author: Expert Panel®
articles.summary: Soundstripe communicates updates to customer feedback proactively. Quizard AI, Inc. builds features based on user feedback about experiences, and Klearcom analyzes customer touchpoints to reveal pain points for better design. These companies are implementing customer-centric design approaches in their product development.

articles.title: Finally, I found a robot vacuum at CES 2025 that can climb stairs
articles.author: Chris Bayer
articles.summary: Roborock introduced a new flagship robot vacuum with a robotic arm at CES 2025. Dreame unveiled its X50 Ultra model, priced at $1,700, which features stair-climbing ability for steps under two inches and improved threshold navigation.

articles.title: More OG Nike Air Zoom Spiridon Colorways Are Releasing Soon
articles.author: Victor Deng
articles.summary: Nike is re-releasing classic Air Zoom Spiridon sneakers, including the OG-styled "Sport Blue" and a women's-exclusive metallic grey and photo blue iteration initially released in 1997. A thunder blue and silver colorway designed in collaboration with Undefeated is scheduled for release in 2025. These retros will be available at Nike.com and select Nike Sportswear retailers this spring.

articles.title: Innovation is key to long-term business success
articles.author: Sponsored Post
articles.summary: Companies need to innovate, improving existing products and processes to meet customers' needs, for instance, Apple keeps improving their iPhone model to cater to customers' needs. Google enabled workers to spend 20% of their time on their chosen projects, which led to the creation of Gmail.

articles.title: Tesla Model Y Refresh Unceremoniously Revealed on Brand's China Site
articles.author: Fred Smith
articles.summary: Tesla has unveiled an updated version of its Model Y, code-named "Juniper," via its Chinese website.  The updated Model Y includes visual changes such as new front and rear light bars, and interior updates like ventilated seats and rear screen displays, matching the facelifted Model 3.

articles.title: Samsung AI Subscription Club will allow phone rentals
articles.author: By:
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics is launching an 'AI Subscription Club' next month, allowing customers to rent Galaxy smartphones and other devices, including the 'Ballie' AI bot. The service will be available in South Korea and the USA, coinciding with the Galaxy S25 smartphone series launch. Ballie, a round AI robot, will also be available as a subscription in Korea and the US.

articles.title: The best of CES 2025: The biggest and wildest announcements from the annual tech show
articles.author: Saqib Shah
articles.summary: Roborock introduced a new robot vacuum droid at CES. The droid features a mechanical arm designed to pick up objects like socks, potentially freeing it from obstructions, and uses AI to differentiate objects.

articles.title: NYT Mini Crossword: Here's clues and answers for Friday, January 10 game
articles.author: The Feed
articles.summary: Inara Marketers offers a 'Performance Marketing for eCommerce Brands' program. Accenture Technology Lead provides an 'AI and Analytics based Business Strategy' program. elearnmarkets provides 'A2Z Of Money' program.

articles.title: Salesforce launches Agentforce for Retail
articles.author: Kim Davis
articles.summary: Salesforce has launched Agentforce for Retail, which enables the creation of AI agents for retail tasks like order management and appointment scheduling. The company also introduced Salesforce Retail Cloud with Modern POS, a platform consolidating online and offline inventory data with integrations for Commerce Cloud, Service Cloud, and Order Management. Saks Fifth Avenue and SharkNinja are testing Agentforce.

articles.title: NYT Connections: See hints and answers for January 10, 2025 puzzle
articles.author: The Feed
articles.summary: Inara Marketers introduced Performance Marketing for eCommerce Brands. StockEdge is offering Financial Education. NSP Strategy Facilitation Ltd. launched Succession Planning Masterclass.

articles.title: Stanley drops ‘New Frequency' collection starting at $35 - Here's where to get it
articles.author: Yzzy Liwanag
articles.summary: Stanley launched the 'New Frequency' collection, featuring the Quencher ProTour Flip Straw Tumbler. This 40 oz tumbler boasts iridescent rose and periwinkle shades, double-wall vacuum insulation to keep drinks cold, and a leakproof ProTour Flip Straw lid for easy, mess-free sipping. The collection is inspired by daily life and self-care, offering hydration solutions with a fresh, elegant design.

articles.title: Royal Caviar Club Partners with Rezolve Ai to Elevate Digital Channels with Conversational Commerce
articles.author: Rezolve AI Ltd
articles.summary: Royal Caviar Club (RCC) is partnering with Rezolve Ai to integrate Rezolve Ai's BRAiN Commerce suite, enhancing its luxury eCommerce platform. This will enable personalized interactions, streamlined checkouts, and AI-driven product recommendations, creating a sophisticated digital experience that mirrors RCC's physical stores and aims to redefine customer engagement in the growing caviar market.

articles.title: GenAI Smartphones to Hit 1 Billion Devices by 2028
articles.author: IANS
articles.summary: Counterpoint Research reports that Generative AI (GenAI) smartphones will account for over 54% of total smartphone shipments by 2028, with an installed base exceeding 1 billion. The integration of GenAI capabilities will be available on both flagship and mid-range smartphones through OS upgrades and new model launches. This expansion is facilitated by 5G penetration and growing on-device AI computing power.

articles.title: Khadas Unveils Modular Mini PC Powered by Intel Core Ultra Series 2 at CES 2025
articles.author: Khadas
articles.summary: Khadas showcased groundbreaking product designs and innovative technologies at CES 2025. These cutting-edge solutions blend innovation with practicality, addressing diverse user needs.

articles.title: Desay SV Collaborates with Qualcomm to Deliver New Intelligent AI Cabin Platform Powered by Snapdragon Elite Automotive Platforms
articles.author: Desay SV
articles.summary: Desay SV introduces the G10PH, a new product designed to enhance computing, graphics, and AI capabilities in automotive cabins. The G10PH is engineered for real-time decision-making, adaptive responses, and proactive assistance. It is built upon successful collaboration and development of innovative cabin platforms for global automakers.

articles.title: Personalized offers now available in Azercell App!
articles.summary: Azercell integrates its app with a Customer Value Management (CVM) platform. This integration allows subscribers to access exclusive, tailored offers and promotions in the "Advantages" section. Users can now activate these offers directly through the Azercell app, simplifying the activation process.

articles.title: 2025 Hyundai Tucson Review: Surprisingly Lovable Comfort
articles.author: Nico De Mattia
articles.summary: Hyundai introduces the 2025 Tucson with a focus on interior design enhancements, new tech features, and improved ride quality. The updated Tucson boasts a more upscale interior, advanced technology, and a softer suspension, while the exterior receives subtle updates. The base model starts at $30,000 and includes a 12.3-inch touchscreen, wireless Apple CarPlay and Android Auto, and various safety features, while the top-end Limited trim offers additional luxury features at $41,870.

articles.title: The quirky evolution of early 2000s phones before the smartphone era
articles.author: Carrington Walker
articles.summary: Samsung released the SPH-N270 model in 2003, marketed to Matrix fans, featuring GPS, calculator, and voice command capabilities. Motorola launched the AURA in 2008 with a circular screen and high price point. Nokia's N95 (2007) had a two-way sliding mechanism, 5MP camera and features like MicroSD support, while Siemens introduced the Xelibri range in 2003.

articles.title: Tesla launches refreshed Model Y in China to fend off domestic rivals
articles.author: Arjun Kharpal
articles.summary: Tesla has announced a revamped version of its Model Y in China, available for pre-sale in the Chinese market. Deliveries are set to begin in March, with a starting price of 263,500 Chinese yuan ($35,935), 5.4% more expensive than the previous model.

articles.title: Edible Garden Introduces Customer Service Platform to Enhance its Patented Green Thumb 2.0 ...
articles.author: Edible Garden AG Incorporated
articles.summary: Edible Garden AG Incorporated launched a new customer service platform to complement its Green Thumb 2.0 greenhouse management system. This platform provides 24/7 direct access for customers and is designed to enhance operational efficiency and the overall customer experience, particularly for small to medium-sized retailers. The platform streamlines order management and delivery routing, aligning with Edible Garden's commitment to sustainability.

articles.title: Netflix Censors WWE RAW: Explicit Language Cut and Runtimes Reduced
articles.author: Pragya Chowdhury
articles.summary: Netflix launched WWE Raw on its platform with an edited version of the show. This version removes explicit language and commercial breaks, condensing the episode's runtime. The launch marks a different approach to wrestling content on streaming services.

articles.title: Lenovo Integrates AI and Robotics to Deliver Smarter Retail Solutions
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Lenovo introduced three new retail solutions at NRF 2025. One of these offerings is Lenovo Retail Content Management Services, which enables retailers to manage and display digital content across multiple locations. This solution includes all necessary hardware and software, allowing for real-time updates and targeted messaging.

articles.title: Henkel unveils its smartwash™ technology at CES 2025
articles.author: Pranjal Malewar
articles.summary: Henkel introduced its Smartwash™ Technology at CES® 2025, featuring AI-driven, cartridge-based detergent dosing for washing machines and dishwashers. The launch of Persil® and Somat® Smartwash, targeting the European market in 2025, aims to optimize cleaning results and reduce waste by dispensing the correct amount of detergent during wash cycles. This technology seeks to revolutionize laundry and dish care by providing more convenience and lower environmental impact.

articles.title: SoftServe Presents New Gen AI Retail Shopping Assistant to Invigorate Retail Experiences
articles.author: Soft Serve
articles.summary: SoftServe has launched the SoftServe Gen AI Retail Shopping Assistant at NRF 2025, which is built with NVIDIA AI Blueprints. This AI-powered solution offers visual search, virtual try-on features, personalized recommendations, and omnichannel shopping capabilities, aiming to improve the retail shopping experience and operational efficiency for retailers. It helps shoppers browse product catalogs, expedite searches, and visualize products before purchase.

articles.title: Get this top-rated Dyson cordless vacuum for just $299.99, only at Target, for a limited time
articles.author: Rachel Sandstrom Morrison
articles.summary: Dyson's V8 Origin Cordless vacuum, known for its power and versatility, is available exclusively at Target. It offers up to 40 minutes of runtime and is currently priced at $299.99, a significant reduction from its regular price of $429.99.

articles.title: Find out how AI can save you time at work (or do your job for you) in 2025
articles.author: Stack Commerce
articles.summary: 1minAI is launching its Advanced Business Plan, an AI tool offering services like blog article generation, image creation, email reply generation, transcription, translation, and voice-over creation, all within a single dashboard. Users can purchase a lifetime subscription for $79.97 for a limited time, which includes monthly usage limits for each service.

articles.title: LUXURY KOREAN TEA OSULLOC LAUNCHES AT EREWHON MARKETS
articles.author: OSULLOC
articles.summary: Luxury Korean tea brand Osulloc is launching its products at Erewhon Markets. This marks the introduction of Osulloc's tea offerings to Erewhon Market customers.

articles.title: Get £130 off 'powerful' and 'lightweight' Bosch cordless vacuum cleaner in Amazon sale
articles.author: Phoebe Barton Lifestyle
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a discount on the Bosch Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner, which features an intelligent auto mode, TurboSpin motor, and multiple attachments. The vacuum promises outstanding cleaning performance and includes a flexible design for reaching under furniture. Some users report excellent suction and ease of use, while others note shorter battery life.

articles.title: Amazon has Revlon's OG blowout brush on sale for nearly half off, and fans say it's their ‘favorite hair tool ever'
articles.author: Danielle Halibey
articles.summary: Amazon is selling the Revlon One-Step Volumizer PLUS Hair Dryer, a top-rated hair tool with a 4.6-star rating from nearly 500,000 customers. It features a smaller barrel size for precise styling, charcoal-infused pins for detangling and moisture absorption, and is suitable for all hair types, especially mid to long lengths.

articles.title: Tesla's redesigned Model Y is here ' but not in the US or Europe
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Tesla has introduced a redesigned Model Y. The updated vehicle is currently unavailable in the US and Europe.

articles.title: The Redmi Note 14 Pro Plus is both good and bad, but it's not ugly
articles.author: Andy Boxall
articles.summary: Xiaomi (Redmi) has introduced the Redmi Note 14 Pro Plus, featuring design improvements, including a new camera module and Corning Gorilla Glass 7i panel. The phone includes a Qualcomm Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 processor, 8GB/12GB RAM options, and a 5,110mAh battery with 120W HyperCharge. The device retains a 200MP main camera, includes a 6.67-inch AMOLED screen, and operates on HyperOS based on Android 14.

articles.title: Inside The First New Major Android Phone For 2025
articles.author: Scott Kramer
articles.summary: OnePlus has launched the OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R smartphones. The OnePlus 13 features a 6.82-inch display, Snapdragon 8 Elite chip, Hassleblad camera with 50MP lenses, and fast charging capabilities, selling for $900 (256GB) or $1000 (512GB). The budget-friendly OnePlus 13R, priced at $600, has a 6.78-inch Gorilla Glass screen and a 50MP rear camera.

articles.title: Single Mom Went From Waitressing To Launching A Multi-Million-Dollar Beard Care Brand
articles.author: Black Enterprise Editors
articles.summary: Marcinda Hankins launched X'clusive Looks Beard Sauce, a beard care product designed to hydrate the beard and nourish the skin underneath. The product addresses issues like dryness, itchiness, breakage, and dandruff, utilizing natural ingredients like honey and is intended to revolutionize men's grooming.

articles.title: Google in 2025: Sundar Pichai reveals AI plans for this year; ‘progress is amazing'
articles.author: Livemint
articles.summary: Sundar Pichai revealed Google's upcoming AI products. The announcement emphasizes the success of recent innovations and expresses optimism for continued progress in 2025.

articles.title: ⚡Galaxy S25 Ultra Coming on January 22; Know What To Expect During Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2025
articles.summary: Samsung is set to launch the Galaxy S25 Ultra smartphone on January 22 during the Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event. Details regarding the expected price, specifications, and features of this top flagship smartphone are anticipated to be revealed.

articles.title: Tata Nexon CNG Review: Know price, new features, specifications, engine color and more
articles.author: Richa Barua
articles.summary: Tata Motors launched the Nexon CNG, featuring iCNG and twin-cylinder technology. This new vehicle provides 321 liters of boot space with a 30-liter twin CNG cylinder. It competes directly with the Maruti Suzuki Brezza CNG in the Indian market.

articles.title: Huawei nova 13i Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Huawei officially announced the nova 13i smartphone on December 14, 2024. The phone features a 6.7-inch display, Qualcomm Snapdragon 680 4G processor, 8GB RAM, 128GB/256GB storage options, a dual-camera setup with a 108MP main lens, and a 5000 mAh battery with 40W wired charging.

articles.title: Redmi is first to bring the Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 to Europe
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Xiaomi's Redmi is launching the affordable Note 14 Pro Plus 5G series in Europe. The new Redmi Note 14 Pro Plus 5G will be available in lavender purple, frost blue, and midnight black and features the Snapdragon 7s Gen.

articles.title: Grok AI iOS app launched with real-time information, image generation features and more- All details
articles.summary: xAI has launched the Grok AI chatbot as a standalone iOS app in the US. The app offers similar features to the X-integrated version, including real-time information access, question answering, and image generation. It is powered by the Grok 2 AI model, and does not require login for basic functionality.

articles.title: How Bollywood's Kancha Cheena Danny Denzongpa became the 'king of good times', built India's 3rd largest beer brand
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: Danny Denzongpa founded Yuksom Breweries in 1987, offering affordable beer options and expanding to 11 brands including Dansberg 16000, Jhoom, and Himalayan Blue. In 2005, he founded Denzong Breweries and prevented United Breweries from entering the northeast market. Yuksom Breweries offers a range of beers and has an annual production capacity of 6.8 lakh hectolitres.

articles.author: Красимир Ангелов
articles.summary: Google offers the 'Google News Showcase' product. This highlights the existence of a Google product.

articles.title: HONOR X9c 5G, now Available for only P16,999! Pre-order to win a ROLEX Watch
articles.author: BMPlus
articles.summary: HONOR Philippines has launched the HONOR X9c 5G, priced at Php 16,999 and available for pre-order from January 10 to 24. The phone features an All-Angle Triple Defense, a long-lasting 6600mAh battery, and a 108MP Ultra-sensing Camera. During the pre-order period, customers have a chance to win a ROLEX DATEJUST Watch and get a FREE HONOR Gift Box.

articles.title: Swiggy Instamart Expands To 76 Cities; Standalone App Available Now
articles.author: Zeenews
articles.summary: Swiggy launched an Instamart-first shortcut for its app. The shortcut is currently available on the Android PlayStore.

articles.title: DJI Neo 2 rumors ALREADY even as Flip drone is teased – what is this madness?
articles.author: Adam Juniper
articles.summary: DJI is expected to launch the DJI Flip drone on January 14, 2025, as teased with the phrase "Open New Possibilities." Additionally, a reliable source suggests the release of the DJI Neo 2 is expected in late 2025. DJI recently launched the O4 Air Unit which makes the world's smallest 4K camera drone possible.

articles.title: Kiehl's Philippines redefines luxury skincare shopping on TikTok Shop
articles.author: Kiehl’s Philippines
articles.summary: Kiehl's launched on TikTok Shop in August 2024, introducing exclusive product bundles and expert-led live-selling sessions. During the Super Grand Opening campaign, Kiehl's saw a 2,000x performance boost and a 3,000x increase in GMV during live sessions, highlighting the success of integrating premium skincare with digital innovation on the platform.

articles.title: LG transparent TV unveiled
articles.author: Daniel Puchert
articles.summary: LG introduced the Signature OLED T TV at CES, featuring a transparent OLED screen. This new TV is designed to offer users more flexibility in organizing their living spaces by eliminating the dominant black screen of conventional TVs.

articles.title: Youdao Dictionary Pen Unveils at CES 2025, Showcasing Cutting-Edge AI Innovations and Applications in Education
articles.author: Youdao
articles.summary: Youdao is showcasing its new AI-equipped smart device, the Youdao Dictionary Pen X7 series, at CES 2025. The Youdao Dictionary Pen X7 series features proprietary applications, including Hi Echo and Mr. P AI Tutor, which are based on the 'Zi Yue' educational large language model and provides offline translation capabilities.

articles.title: AuraGleam Reviews: Does This Skincare Device Really Deliver That Coveted Glow?
articles.summary: AuraGleam is introduced as a new advanced skincare device utilizing vibration and heat therapy to enhance skincare routines. It improves skin texture, blood circulation, and absorption of skincare products. Priced competitively and available online, AuraGleam aims to provide a spa-like experience at home with visible improvements in skin's firmness, texture and overall appearance.

articles.title: [Must-Read] AuraGleam: The Beauty Community's Secret to Flawless Skin
articles.summary: AuraGleam, a new skincare device, utilizes sonic vibration technology to enhance the absorption of skincare products. It features an ergonomic, portable design and a heating function to open pores.  The device is priced starting at $54.95 and offers discounts for multiple purchases.

articles.title: Samsung To Roll Out Paid Subscription For Galaxy Smartphones Next Month
articles.author: DC Web Desk
articles.summary: Samsung will introduce the 'AI Subscription Club' for Galaxy smartphones and its AI robot Ballie, starting next month. The subscription, launched in December 2024 for home appliances in South Korea, will grant users access to AI features and repair services. Samsung is also set to launch the Galaxy S25 series and One UI 7 at the Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22, 2025.

articles.title: Samsung Opens Pre-Reserve for the Next Galaxy S Series in India
articles.summary: Samsung has announced pre-reservations for its next Galaxy S series smartphone, emphasizing a new chapter in mobile AI. Customers in India can pre-reserve by paying INR 2000, receiving early access and benefits up to INR 5000 upon purchase. The next generation of Galaxy S series will be unveiled at Galaxy Unpacked on January 22 in San Jose, California.

articles.title: Verizon Promo Codes and Deals
articles.author: Wired
articles.summary: Verizon provides savings on phones, tablets, and internet services through its discount program. Customers can click to access more details regarding these promotional offers.

articles.title: The beauty products and gadgets I tried, tested and loved last year
articles.author: Sali Hughes
articles.summary: Saie launched Dew Bronze, a natural-looking bronzing liquid. Elf released Lash XTNDR mascara. Garnier launched Vitamin C Daily UV Brightening Fluid Sheer Glow and Soothing Hyaluronic Aloe Cream Cleanser. Dr Emma Craythorne introduced Klira, a bespoke subscription skincare service. Charlotte Tilbury launched Unreal Skin Foundation Stick, and Make Up For Ever released HD Skin Hydra Glow Foundation. Dyson launched AirStrait for hair straightening, and Ziip introduced Ziip Halo facial gadget.

articles.title: KHIND offers complete laundry solution with three years of free detergent capsules
articles.author: New Straits Times
articles.summary: KHIND is launching a 'Rent to Own' (RTO) program for washer dryers, offering customers a three-year supply of detergent capsules for free. The program includes insurance and maintenance for a monthly fee of RM125 over 36 months, providing an end-to-end laundry solution.

articles.title: Revealed: Arsenal will NOT be able to afford a record fee for Newcastle star Alexander Isak this summer – as Mikel Arteta is dealt blow in his pursuit of Magpies striker
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Yoast SEO, launched in 2008, is a WordPress plugin that provides a suite of features for optimizing website content and improving site visibility. The plugin offers an intuitive interface that simplifies the SEO process, focusing on enhancing user experience and technical site performance to achieve higher rankings and better engagement.

articles.title: Best Caviar Shop Singapore - Nomad Caviar's Launches Premium Online Delivery SG
articles.author: Plentisoft
articles.summary: NOMAD Caviar announced free, guaranteed, next-day delivery on all orders placed before 4 PM in Singapore. This initiative aims to transform the perception of caviar and making it an accessible everyday delicacy. This service caters to those planning special events or simply wishing to indulge in caviar without delay.

articles.title: Equipped with 8GB/128GB RAM and 50 MP Main Camera!
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: The POCO C65 is launched as a budget-friendly smartphone with features like a large display, a 50MP camera, and a long-lasting battery. Starting at Rp. 1,399,000, it aims to offer a blend of performance, design, and affordability in the competitive budget smartphone market. The phone targets students, professionals, and users looking for a reliable device without overspending.

articles.title: Tesla launches redesigned Model Y in China, seeking to fend off rivals
articles.author: Hong Kong Standard
articles.summary: Tesla launched a new version of the Model Y in China. The redesigned exterior and upgraded features aim to regain market share from rivals like Xiaomi.

articles.title: ChatGPT's newest feature lets users assign it traits like 'chatty' and 'Gen Z
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: OpenAI is introducing a new feature to ChatGPT that allows users to customize interactions by assigning traits like 'chatty' and 'Gen Z.' The existing custom instructions menu has been revamped with new options.

articles.title: Rare Dyson discount is perfect time to pick up 'most powerful' vacuum for a lot less
articles.author: Joshua Boyles
articles.summary: Dyson is offering a £100 discount on its V8 Advanced vacuum cleaner, which boasts features like a removable head for handheld use and a docking station. Customer reviews on retailer websites give the Dyson V8 an average rating of 4.4 stars, highlighting its effectiveness, particularly for homes with pets.

articles.title: You can finally buy a Thunderbolt 5 SSD
articles.author: Andrew Liszewski
articles.summary: Seagate announced its new Thunderbolt 5 LaCie Rugged SSD Pro5 external drive, which will be available this month in 2TB and 4TB versions priced at $399.99 and $599.99, respectively. The SSD will offer read speeds of 6,700MB/s and write speeds of 5,300MB/s. The new SSD comes in a rubber enclosure in blue, black, and orange color options.

articles.title: Zomato & Swiggy's 10-Minute Food Delivery In Limbo? Restaurant Body Objects Says May Take Legal Recourse
articles.author: Juviraj Anchil
articles.summary: Zomato (Zomato Blinkit/Blinkit Bistro) and Swiggy (Swiggy Snacc) are introducing 10-minute food delivery services, replicating Zepto Cafe's model. This is intensifying competition in the quick-service food delivery market, with Flipkart also planning to launch Flipkart 10 minutes. However, the NRAI objects to these services, claiming they violate marketplace neutrality and undermine fair competition.

articles.title: 2025 Tesla Model Y price and specs: New-look EV more expensive
articles.author: Jordan Mulach
articles.summary: Tesla is launching the updated Model Y in Australia from May 2025 with Launch Series enhancements, available initially in RWD and Long Range AWD variants. The updated Model Y features sleeker Cybertruck-inspired front end with full-width LED light bars, retuned suspension for greater comfort, ventilated front seats, and an 8.0-inch rear touchscreen with power-reclining seats.

articles.title: 20 Target Dresses That Are Sure To Become *That Dress* In Your Closet
articles.author: Amanda Edelman
articles.summary: Target is offering a variety of new dress styles, including lace midis, tailored black dresses, shimmery slip dresses, and floral midis. These dresses cater to diverse occasions and personal styles, ranging from casual outings to formal events.

articles.title: 2025 Tesla Model Y price and specs: New-look EV more expensive
articles.author: Jordan Mulach
articles.summary: Tesla's Model Y is scheduled to arrive in Australia from May 2025. The new model features cosmetic and mechanical enhancements but will have a higher price.

articles.title: 2025 Tesla Model Y price and specs: New-look EV more expensive
articles.author: Jordan Mulach
articles.summary: Tesla Model Y is set to launch in Australia from May 2025. The new model includes cosmetic and mechanical enhancements and will have a higher price.

articles.title: GlocalMe Unveils New Brand Identity and Cutting-Edge Innovations at CES 2025
articles.author: Ucloudlink Group Inc.
articles.summary: GlocalMe is unveiling a new brand identity. GlocalMe is introducing cutting-edge innovations at CES 2025.

articles.title: 2025 Tesla Model Y revealed: Fresh look for world's best-selling EV
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: Tesla unveiled an updated Model Y featuring a redesigned aesthetic and a price increase. The refreshed Model Y suggests enhancements and availability.

articles.title: The super-flexible Samsung has a release date. We will see you surprisingly soon
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung is developing the Galaxy Flex G, a foldable smartphone featuring a unique 'G' shaped folding mechanism, showcased at CES 2022 and MWC 2023. The company is also innovating with rollable display technology. Aiming to lead in mobile innovation, Samsung plans a limited initial release of the Flex G, addressing durability concerns and testing market response.

articles.title: China is helping keep station wagons alive
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: Zeekr developed Zeekr 007 GT. Zeekr intends to broaden brand's appeal in Europe with Zeekr 007 GT.

articles.title: This tiny phone is worth the hype
articles.author: Boing Boing'S Shop
articles.summary: The NanoPhone, a mini smartphone, is available for $89.97. This 3.5-inch phone functions like an Android, has dual-SIM support, a 2,000mAh battery, works globally, and includes a case and screen protector. It's designed as a portable and convenient alternative for users.

articles.title: GA Technologies Expands ITANDI BB with New Advanced Options for Real Estate Agents
articles.summary: ITANDI Inc., a subsidiary of GA technologies Co., Ltd., will launch 'Additional Advanced Options' for its ITANDI BB real estate agent site in the upcoming spring. These paid features aim to enhance operational efficiency for real estate agents through functionalities such as a Customized Search Function and Floor Plan Modification, solidifying ITANDI BB's role in the real estate industry.

articles.title: Xpeng reveals its next attack on the Tesla Model Y
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: Xpeng, a Chinese electric vehicle brand, is launching the G7, a new SUV. This new product is designed to compete with the Tesla Model Y.

articles.title: Samsung will soon let you rent its phones instead of buying them
articles.author: Business Ghana
articles.summary: Samsung is considering launching a smartphone subscription service that will allow customers to rent Samsung Galaxy phones, including the upcoming Samsung Galaxy S25. This service was rumored to be discussed at CES 2025.

articles.title: The Magnificent Seven tech stocks: bubble or unstoppable?
articles.author: Straits Times
articles.summary: Leading technology companies are introducing a novel line of augmented reality glasses. These glasses provide users with an immersive digital experience, integrating real-time information and interactive elements. This launch marks a significant shift in the tech industry, setting a new standard for wearable technology and personal computing.

articles.title: Tesla finally launches the refreshed 2025 Model Y in the Asia-Pacific region
articles.author: Engadget
articles.summary: Tesla unveiled a facelifted Model Y with new styling, designed to compete with rivals. This refreshed "Juniper" model is currently available in the Asia Pacific region and is expected to be released in the United States soon.

articles.title: ChatGPT is getting powerful new custom personalities – and they could change how you use ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: OpenAI is introducing powerful new customization features to ChatGPT. These features represent an update and enhancement to the ChatGPT service, offering users more control and personalization options.

articles.title: Roborock's Saros Line Features Useful AI and a Robotic Arm
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Roborock introduced a new line of robot vacuums at CES in Las Vegas. The new product line is packed with new technology that has practical applications.

articles.title: OnePlus 13 series is now available for purchase: Price in India, offers and more
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: OnePlus launched the OnePlus 13 series, featuring the OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R smartphones. The OnePlus 13 is now available for sale in India, while the OnePlus 13R will be available soon.

articles.title: A Robot Mower Unlike Any Other Is My Top Target From CES 2025
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Lymow mower offers unique functionalities compared to other robot lawn mowers. This positions it as a potentially leading product for 2025. The Lymow mower seems to have a distinct advantage in the market.

articles.title: SearchLoom.com Transforms Domain Acquisition with AI-Powered Tools and Comprehensive Domain Analysis
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: SearchLoom.com introduces an AI-powered domain search platform. The platform aims to simplify the process of finding and securing domain names.

articles.title: Do Nvidia's GeForce RTX 50-series specs live up to the hype?
articles.author: PC World
articles.summary: Nvidia launched a new GPU generation, showcasing their new gaming flagship, which costs $2,000.

articles.title: Tesla Model Y 2025: Price, features, specifications, and everything you need to know
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: Tesla launched a revamped Model Y in China. The updated vehicle features a new design and upgraded interior.

articles.title: Sexy robot unveiled at Vegas tech conference is world's most realistic
articles.author: The Daily Mail
articles.summary: A new 'companion robot' debuted at a major tech event in Vegas this week. The robot features realistic physical attributes like perfectly shaped breasts, a pert buttocks, and thick lips.

articles.title: Tesla unveils new model Y in China to regain market share amid competition
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Tesla launched a new version of its Model Y car in China on Friday. The updated Model Y features a redesigned exterior and upgraded interior features. Tesla aims to regain market share lost to competitors like Xiaomi with this new version.

articles.title: Exclusive Rate For 6 Months! Fortnightly Cleaning Promo
articles.summary: Premium Clean New Zealand is offering exclusive discounts on its fortnightly cleaning services for new customers who sign up for six months during January 2025. The service provides convenient, cost-effective, and eco-friendly cleaning solutions with no lock-in contracts, allowing customers to cancel anytime.

articles.title: Local man's business grows from Dundas garage to Northfield laudromat
articles.author: Colton Kemp
articles.summary: Washed Again is a laundromat aiming to provide a higher standard of comfort and cleanliness. Owner Luke LaCroix is introducing a laundry drop-off and pick-up service with dispersed dropboxes around the city. This is to address the difficulty some people have in finding comfortable and clean laundromats.

articles.title: Local man's business grows from Dundas garage to Northfield laundromat
articles.author: Colton Kemp
articles.summary: Luke LaCroix launched Washed Again, a laundromat offering pickup and delivery services. The Washed Again Laundry Center features 32 dryers and 27 washers of various sizes, aiming to provide a clean and welcoming environment for customers. The laundromat is open from 6 a.m. to 10 p.m. daily at 2004 Jefferson Road, Suite A in Northfield.

articles.title: Lather up with love: How to keep your skin moisturised and happy
articles.author: Team Indulge
articles.summary: ITC introduced Vivel Lavender & Almond Oil Body Wash priced at Rs 300 for 500 ml. Dove offers Deep Moisture Body Wash with NutriumMoisture™ technology for dry skin, priced at Rs 550 for 800 ml. Fiama has Lavender and Tangerine Shower Gel for a refreshing experience, available for Rs 400 for 500ml. Plum offers Vanilla Vibes Shower Gel for a luxurious shower experience. Nivea's Creme Soft Body Wash is known for its rich, creamy texture. Lux offers Soft Touch Body Wash with a blend of French rose and silk essence, priced at Rs 99 for 235ml.
